duties_responsibilities.duty: Promote and continuously reinforce the Atlas Culture and Values in all property management activities.
Serve as the main point of contact for owner communications from start to finish of property leasing and management processes.
Oversee and delegate all aspects of showing, leasing, renewing, and move-outs of the properties in the portfolio.
Maintain a 95% occupancy and collections rate for the properties in the portfolio.
Delegate tasks to the Assistant Portfolio Manager to ensure efficient management processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Real Estate Management, or a related field
